CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS User( id INT(10) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, firstName VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, surname VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, password VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, email VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, phoneNumber VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, city VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, isEnabled TINYINT(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT 1, isAdmin TINYINT(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
PRIMARY KEY(id) )
